alert.note: Alert for Appomattox; Buckingham (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:33PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Appomattox and south central Buckingham Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 233 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hixburg, or 9 miles east of Appomattox, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hixburg... Sheppards... and Andersonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
